name: R5-Composition-R4-Composition
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R5 Composition into FHIR R4

element.display: A set of resources composed into a single coherent clinical statement with clinical attestation

target.display: A set of resources composed into a single coherent clinical statement with clinical attestation
target.comment: R5 `Composition` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Composition`
R5 `Composition.attester` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Composition.attester`

R5 `Composition.attester.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `Composition.attester.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `extension`
R5 `Composition.attester.id` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Composition.attester.id`

R5 `Composition.attester.mode` maps as RelatedTo to R4 `Composition.attester.mode` - mode made the binding required (from Preferred) for http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/composition-attestation-mode|4.0.1; mode has change due to type change: R5 mode CodeableConcept has no equivalent or mapped type in R4 mode

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R5 `Composition.attester.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `Composition.attester.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `modifierExtension`
R5 `Composition.attester.party` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Composition.attester.party`
R5 `Composition.attester.time` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Composition.attester.time`

element.display: Who and/or what authored the composition

target.display: Who and/or what authored the composition
target.comment: R5 `Composition.author` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Composition.author`
R5 `Composition.category` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Composition.category`
R5 `Composition.contained` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Composition.contained`
R5 `Composition.custodian` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Composition.custodian`
R5 `Composition.date` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Composition.date`
R5 `Composition.encounter` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Composition.encounter`
R5 `Composition.event` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Composition.event`

element.display: The event(s) being documented, as code(s), reference(s), or both

target.comment: R5 `Composition.event.detail` maps as RelatedTo to R4 `Composition.event.detail` - detail removed a binding requirement - Example http://terminology.hl7.org/ValueSet/v3-ActCode; detail has change due to type change: R5 detail CodeableReference has no equivalent or mapped type in R4 detail

R5 `Composition.event.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `Composition.event.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `extension`
R5 `Composition.event.id` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Composition.event.id`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R5 `Composition.event.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `Composition.event.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `modifierExtension`

element.display: The period covered by the documentation

target.display: The period covered by the documentation
target.comment: R5 `Composition.event.period` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Composition.event.period`

R5 `Composition.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `Composition.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `extension`
R5 `Composition.id` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Composition.id`
R5 `Composition.identifier` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `Composition.identifier` - identifier changed from array to scalar (max cardinality from * to 1)

element.display: A set of rules under which this content was created

target.display: A set of rules under which this content was created
target.comment: R5 `Composition.implicitRules` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Composition.implicitRules`

R5 `Composition.language` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget to R4 `Composition.language` - language changed the binding strength from Required to Preferred; language has change due to type change: R5 `language` `code` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget for R4 `language`
R5 `Composition.meta` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Composition.meta`

R5 `Composition.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `Composition.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `modifierExtension`

R5 `Composition.relatesTo` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `Composition.relatesTo` - relatesTo has change due to type change: R5 relatesTo RelatedArtifact has no equivalent or mapped type in R4 relatesTo
R5 `Composition.section` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Composition.section`

element.display: Who and/or what authored the section

target.display: Who and/or what authored the section
target.comment: R5 `Composition.section.author` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Composition.section.author`
R5 `Composition.section.code` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Composition.section.code`
R5 `Composition.section.emptyReason` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Composition.section.emptyReason`

element.display: A reference to data that supports this section

target.display: A reference to data that supports this section
target.comment: R5 `Composition.section.entry` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Composition.section.entry`

R5 `Composition.section.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `Composition.section.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `extension`

element.display: Who/what the section is about, when it is not about the subject of composition

target.display: Who/what the section is about, when it is not about the subject of composition
target.comment: R5 `Composition.section.focus` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Composition.section.focus`
R5 `Composition.section.id` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Composition.section.id`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R5 `Composition.section.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `Composition.section.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `modifierExtension`
R5 `Composition.section.orderedBy` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Composition.section.orderedBy`
R5 `Composition.section.section` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Composition.section.section`

element.display: Text summary of the section, for human interpretation

target.display: Text summary of the section, for human interpretation
target.comment: R5 `Composition.section.text` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Composition.section.text`
R5 `Composition.section.title` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Composition.section.title`

element.display: registered | partial | preliminary | final | amended | corrected | appended | cancelled | entered-in-error | deprecated | unknown

target.comment: R5 `Composition.status` maps as RelatedTo to R4 `Composition.status` - status has INCOMPATIBLE required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/composition-status|5.0.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/composition-status|4.0.1; status has change due to type change: R5 `status` `code` maps as RelatedTo for R4 `status`

element.display: Who and/or what the composition is about

target.display: Who and/or what the composition is about
target.comment: R5 `Composition.subject` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `Composition.subject` - subject changed from array to scalar (max cardinality from * to 1)

element.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation

target.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation
target.comment: R5 `Composition.text` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Composition.text`
R5 `Composition.title` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Composition.title`
R5 `Composition.type` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Composition.type`

element.display: Canonical identifier for this Composition, represented as a URI (globally unique)
The context that the content is intended to support
An explicitly assigned identifer of a variation of the content in the Composition
